PASSWORD_PATTERN: Password must be at least 8 and include at least 1 letter, 1 number and 1 capital letter
FULL_NAME_MAXLENGTH: Name must be at most 50 characters
FULL_NAME_MINLENGTH: Name must be at least 6 characters
USERNAME_MINLENGTH: Username must be at least 3 characters
ANONYMOUS_THOUGHTS: Some thoughts are easier to share when no one knows your name. Here, your words speak for you — anonymously.
SPEAK_YOUR_MIND: Speak your mind without fear or judgment. Your identity stays hidden, but your voice is heard.

IDENTITY_HIDDEN: Your identity will remain completely hidden
MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: Message must be at least 3 characters
